name: Retrieve unmanaged devices
description: Retrieves a list of unmanaged devices discovered on the network.

$top.description:
Specifies the number of objects to retrieve.
Example: 5

$skip.description:
Bypasses the specified number of objects in the results returned.
For example, if you specify 10, the results start at object 11.
Example: 5

$search.description:
Returns only objects that include the specified text string. For example, "name" returns objects that include "hostname" and "username".
The supported search fields depend on the endpoint:
	- Devices: Host name, description, IP address, logged on user
	- DeviceProtectionStatus: Host name
	- ManagedConfigurations: Name, description
Example: name

$count.description:
Indicates whether to return a counter that shows the total number of objects in the total_items response parameter.
Example: true

$orderby.description:
Specifies how to order results. You can order by any parameter in the response and sort results in ascending or descending order.
Specify a parameter name with any underscores removed, followed by a + (plus sign) and either asc (ascending) or desc (descending).
For example, to order results by the host_name parameter in descending order, specify hostname+desc. If you do not specify a field to order by, the API will use the order in the database.
Example: hostname+desc

total_items.description:
Total number of devices.
If the count request parameter is true, total_items displays the total number of devices. If count is false, then total_items displays null.
Example: 42

agent_version.description: Version of the agent installed in the endpoint.

domain.description: Domain to which your devices belong on Microsoft networks.

encryption.description:
Device encryption status.
- 0: Without protection or without information
- 1: Activated
- 2: Deactivated
- 3: Error
- 4: Error installing
- 5: Without license
- 6: Not available

isolation_state.description:
Isolation state of the device.
- 0: Not isolated
- 1: Isolated
- 2: Applying isolation
- 3: Removing isolation

last_connection.description: Date and time of the last connection of the device.

license_status.description:
Status of the device license.
- 0: Assigned
- 1: Not assigned
- 2: Manual deallocation
- 3: Auto deallocation

items.description: List of MAC addresses of devices.

operating_system.description: Name of the operating system installed on the device.

platform_id.description:
Device platform.
- 1: Windows
- 2: Linux
- 3: macOS
- 4: Android

reboot_requested.description: Indicates whether a device reboot is requested.

reinstall_agent_requested.description: Indicates whether reinstallation of the agent is requested.

reinstall_protection_requested.description: Indicates whether reinstallation of protection is requested.

site_name.description: Name of the site the device belongs to.

type.description:
Type of device.
- 1: Workstation
- 2: Laptop
- 3: Server
- 4: Mobile device
